misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a member of Keimola Golf, is one of the most accomplished players in the history of the Hector Trophée.  His record speaks for itself: a three-time winner of the coveted team title, Timo consistently places himself among the tournament's elite.

His first victory came in 2021, a performance that showcased his exceptional skills and marked him as a rising star.  He followed that with wins in 2022 and at Hector Trophée III, cementing his legacy as a Hector Trophée legend.  While he's yet to claim the Victor trophy for individual play, his team success underscores his competitive prowess and strategic brilliance.

Known for his powerful drives and deft touch around the greens, Timo is also a strong advocate and ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting. This dedication to precision and consistent performance is evident in his consistent top finishes at the Hector Trophée over the past four years, competing in the tournament every year since 2022.
